backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list summarizing major frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and base layout styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file setting up the root div and loading the main React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/inquiry/InquiryS: Inquiry list button showing total item count and navigating to the inquiry page.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying contact links, address, social icons, and quick navigation links.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Sticky header with site logo, contact links, navigation buttons, and inquiry summary button.
frontend/src/components/site/Interactive: Canvas component rendering animated blueprint background with mouse‑reactive particles.
frontend/src/components/site/PageTransit: Wrapper applying a fade‑in animation to page transitions.
Defines the main site layout with header, footer, background, and routed content wrapped in a page transition.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Exports static contact details including phone numbers, email, address, and map URLs.
frontend/src/data/catalog.ts: Defines product categories with IDs, descriptions, and icons.
frontend/src/data/inventory.ts: Provides a static list of products keyed by category with names, descriptions, and brands.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiry.ts: Wraps inquiry store actions and returns items plus utility functions like counting totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider handling login, stored identities, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind styles, themes, CSS variables, and global UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, Internet Identity provider, React Query, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Renders a category view showing products and allows adding, updating, or removing items from the inquiry list.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with phone, email, and business hours using data from CONTACT_INFO.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero text, product categories grid, and CTA navigation to contact.
frontend/src/pages/InquiryPage.tsx: Shows the inquiry list with quantity controls and navigation to proceed or return home.
frontend/src/pages/LeadFormPage.tsx: Implements a lead submission form with validation, saving submissions, and redirecting on success.
frontend/src/pages/LeadSuccessPage.tsx: Displays a success message and clears the inquiry list after a form submission.
frontend/src/state/inquiryStore.ts: Defines a persisted Zustand store for managing inquiry items and quantity updates.
frontend/src/storage/submissions.ts: Handles saving, retrieving, and clearing lead submissions in localStorage.
frontend/src/styles/effects.css: Provides 3D text and card hover effects with responsive behavior.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color system, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project state file defining site goals, requirements, architectural notes, and existing features for a lead-generation website.
